subject: the spooks like acrylic?
author: Ken Thomas
full_text:
--0-1843525341-1176491451=:84432
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

has anyone else run into this?
   
  if you take a scrap of clear acrylic and put a tiny scratch in it and illuminate from side, it seems to make them more talkative.  polystyreene has the opposite effect
   
  polycarbonate seems to be neutral
